title: SPA FOAM OUT
long_description: SPA FOAM OUTÂ prevents and eliminates foam in spa water. It is designed for use in aerated and heated water. It works in seconds so that you can enjoy your spa sooner.
short_description: BENEFIT Acts quickly to eliminate foaming in spa water FORMAT 500 mL

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Pour SPA FOAM OUT directly over the surface of the spa water.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add SPA FOAM OUT according to the application method and recommended dosage. Wait about 10 minutes and repeat treatment if foam has not disappeared. Wait 5 minutes before bathing.

characteristics.title: Note
characteristics.text: This treatment can be used as often as needed to stop foaming.

dosage.specifications: Add 10 mL of SPA FOAM OUT per 1,000 L of spa water. Use once a week for regular maintenance.

warning: DO NOT apply the product when people are in the spa. Shake well before using. Spa must be running before adding SPA FOAM OUT.
